metadata.title: Tasker Getting Started Guide - ManzelHelp
metadata.description: Complete guide for new taskers on ManzelHelp. Learn how to set up your profile, find customers, and start earning money in Morocco.

hero.title: Getting Started as a Tasker
hero.description: Your complete guide to becoming a successful tasker on ManzelHelp. Learn how to set up your profile, find customers, and start earning money in Morocco.

gettingStarted.title: Your Journey to Success
gettingStarted.description: Follow these steps to become a successful tasker on our platform

createAccount.title: Create Your Account
createAccount.description: Sign up with your email and basic information

verification.title: Complete Verification
verification.description: Go through our verification process to build trust

buildProfile.title: Build Your Profile
buildProfile.description: Create an attractive profile that stands out
details: Write compelling descriptions in Arabic and French
Define your service area in Morocco

startEarning.title: Start Earning
startEarning.description: Begin accepting jobs and building your reputation

beResponsive.title: Be Responsive
beResponsive.description: Reply to messages within 2 hours to increase your chances of getting hired

maintainQuality.title: Maintain Quality
maintainQuality.description: Consistently deliver excellent service to build a strong reputation

buildRelationships.title: Build Relationships
buildRelationships.description: Focus on building long-term relationships with repeat customers

stayActive.title: Stay Active
stayActive.description: Regularly update your availability and respond to new opportunities

earningPotential.title: Earning Potential
earningPotential.description: See how much you can earn with different services (based on 40 hours/week). Prices are in MAD and vary based on experience and location in Morocco.

petcare.name: Pet Care
petcare.description: Dog walking, pet sitting, and grooming

basic.title: Basic Requirements
items: Have a valid Moroccan government-issued ID (CIN)

whatYouNeed.title: What You'll Need
items: Bank account for payments (cash payments on delivery)

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
importantNotes.description: Please read these important points before starting
points: ManzelHelp is a platform only - you are responsible for your services
Payments are made in cash on delivery
You must comply with all applicable Moroccan laws and regulations
You are responsible for obtaining any necessary licenses or permits
You should have appropriate insurance coverage for your work if needed
All disputes must be resolved directly between you and the customer

cta.title: Ready to Start Earning?
cta.description: Join thousands of successful taskers who are already earning money doing what they love in Morocco. Start your journey today!
